name: @angular/forms
notes: Angular Forms is part of Angular framework for browser-based client-side rendering. Requires DOM APIs and browser environment (form controls, validators, directives). Not designed for serverless environments like Workers.
errorMessage: Disallowed operation called within global scope. Asynchronous I/O (ex: fetch() or connect()), setting a timeout, and generating random values are not allowed within global scope. To fix this error, perform this operation within a handler. https://developers.cloudflare.com/workers/runtime-apis/handlers/
